this_title: From Fat Lolli to Six Pack Lolli - The Ultimate Transformation Story
introduction: Having been obese his entire life, real estate mogul and multimillionaire, Anthony Lolli has accepted his greatest challenge to date. Follow this inspiring journey as he sheds 125lbs in only 9 months leading to a fitness competition where he shows the world that nothing is unachievable. Through blood, sweat, and tears, From Fat Lolli to 6 Pack Lolli is truly the Ultimate Transformation Story. Written by Lolli Brands
foreign_title: From Fat Lolli to Six Pack Lolli - The Ultimate Transformation Story
